column4: Hello everyone. When I first installed Ubuntu, I created a / partition, a swap, and a /home partition. My system is completely borked, and I need to reinstall Ubuntu. How can I do this without risking the destruction of my /home partition?
my personal fav solution-- take the hard disk out.. connect to other computer as secondry.. then mount that HD back up your artition /home and then do what u like with the HD
Won't that still overwrite the data in /home?
